title: Adani Group To Invest Rs 1 Lakh Crore In Airports Over Next Five Years
description: Adani Group plans to invest Rs 1 lakh crore in its airports business over the next five years, betting on sustained growth in India's aviation sector, which is expected to expand at 15-16% annually, a top group official said.

title: Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd slips for fifth straight session
description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd is quoting at Rs 274.3, down 0.27% on the day as on 13:19 IST on the NSE. The stock jumped 16.57% in last one year as compared to a 10.04% rally in NIFTY and a 0.78% fall in the Nifty Energy index.

title: Adani Total Gas Ltd drops for fifth straight session
description: Adani Total Gas Ltd is quoting at Rs 577.25, down 0.81% on the day as on 13:19 IST on the NSE. The stock jumped 16.57% in last one year as compared to a 10.04% rally in NIFTY and a 0.78% fall in the Nifty Energy index.

title: Adani Enterprises Ltd drops for fifth straight session
description: Adani Enterprises Ltd is quoting at Rs 2215.5, down 0.62% on the day as on 13:19 IST on the NSE. The stock tumbled 2.55% in last one year as compared to a 10.04% rally in NIFTY and a 18.75% spurt in the Nifty Metal index.

title: Knowledge Marine bags rock dredging contract from Dredging Corporation
description: Knowledge Marine & Engineering Works said that it has received a rock dredging work contract from Dredging Corporation of India (DCIL) worth Rs 58.39 crore.

title: Thousands in region still without power
description: Avista restores power to 86% of its clients and continues to address outages in Quad Cities

title: Gloria “Glo” Ronnau
description: In Loving Memory of Gloria “Glo” Ronnau Gloria Ronnau was born in Los Angeles in 1921 to Henry and Bertha Becnel. title: Krystiana Duque
description: With profound sadness we announce the passing of Krystiana Duque on December 13, 2025, due to complications related to diabetes. Krystiana was a graduate of Vallejo schools having attended Benicia High School and Saint Patrick Saint Vincent High School. She enjoyed participating in various sports and being part of the Te Mana O Te Ra [...]

title: Janet Marie Flores
description: Janet Marie Flores passed away peacefully on November 21, 2025 at the age of 94 surrounded by the love of her family. Jan was born on October 31, 1931 in San Francisco to loving parents Alice Detour and Joseph Hettrick. Jan was a loving mother, grandmother and great grandmother who found her greatest joy in [...]
